name: check(_:range:types:options:inSpellDocumentWithTag:orthography:wordCount:)
desc: Requests unified text checking for the given range of the given string.
declaration:
func check(_ stringToCheck: String, 
     range: NSRange, 
     types checkingTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes, 
   options: [NSSpellChecker.OptionKey : Any]? = nil, 
inSpellDocumentWithTag tag: Int, 
orthography: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSOrthography?>?, 
 wordCount: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?) -> [NSTextCheckingResult]
